place.name: SILIAN
place.gazetteerText: SILIAN, a parish in Lampeter district, Cardigan; 2¼ miles N by W of Lampeter r. station. Post town, Lampeter, under Carmarthen. Acres, 2,182. Real property, £980. Pop., 341. Houses, 73. The property is divided among a few. The living is a p. curacy, annexed to Llanwnnen. The church is old but good. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
